title: Entregador de Flor - Ao Vivo em Brasília
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Vai lá entregador de flor
lines.translation: Go ahead, flower delivery man!
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'Go ahead, flower delivery man!'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Dar assistência pra isso
lines.translation: To provide assistance for that.
lines.grammar: Verbs: dar, isso. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'To provide assistance for that.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que eu e ela tá chamando de amor
lines.translation: What she and I are calling love.
lines.grammar: Verbs: chamando. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'What she and I are calling love.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E o coração se acostumou
lines.translation: And the heart got used to it.
lines.grammar: Verbs: coração, acostumou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'And the heart got used to it.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que de sete em sete dias
lines.translation: That every seven days
lines.grammar: Verbs: dias. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); em + article contracts (no/na/nos/nas). Meaning: 'That every seven days'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu mando um novo, por que o outro murchou
lines.translation: I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.
lines.grammar: Verbs: mando, novo, outro. Prepositions/case: por (cause/path). Meaning: 'I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pra não dar tempo dela me esquecer
lines.translation: So she doesn't have time to forget me.
lines.grammar: Verbs: dar, tempo, esquecer. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'So she doesn't have time to forget me.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Toda semana eu mando um buquê
lines.translation: Every week I send a bouquet.
lines.grammar: Verbs: mando. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Every week I send a bouquet.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Vou te encher de flor minha flor
lines.translation: I'm going to shower you with flowers, my flower.
lines.grammar: Verbs: vou, encher. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'I'm going to shower you with flowers, my flower.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.translation: I'm going to shower you with loving kisses.
lines.grammar: Verbs: vou, encher. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'I'm going to shower you with loving kisses.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Quero ver cê reclamar
lines.translation: I want to see you complain.
